text:
@narendramodi @MagufuliJP India After Ram Mandir Order and CAA : 
1. Covid-19 crisis
2. Locust Attack
3. Uttrakhand Fire
4. Earthquakes
5. Cyclone
6. Heat wave
7. Job losses
8. Economy Fall
9. Flood (Coming)
10. Many More To Come in sha Allah
